import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './styles/index.css'; // We import the images directly into the component. // This is the most reliable way to handle images in React, // as the build tool will properly process and find them. import hotchili from './hotchili.jpg'; import logo from './logo.png'; function App() { const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); // Function to toggle the mobile menu state const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen); }; // State for the contact form const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const [formStatus, setFormStatus] = useState(''); // Handle form input changes const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setFormStatus('Sending...'); // Simulate an API call try { await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500)); console.log('Form data submitted:', formData); setFormStatus('Message sent successfully!'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); // Reset form } catch (error) { console.error('Form submission failed:', error); setFormStatus('Failed to send message. Please try again.'); } }; return (

Delivering the Soul of India, Spice by Spice

We are a leading exporter of premium Indian spices, committed to quality, authenticity, and bridging cultures through flavor.

Explore Our Spices
{/* About Us Section */}

About Us

PKVK Integrated Exports LLP is dedicated to bringing the rich, authentic flavors of India to the global market, with a special focus on Africa. With over 15 years of on-ground experience in Nigeria, our founder has a deep understanding of local market needs, allowing us to deliver high-quality, market-tailored products.

{/* Products Section */}

Our Products

Our Current Product Line

We specialize in a variety of processed and packaged Indian spices, including:

  • Chilli Powder
  • Turmeric
  • Cumin
  • Coriander
  • Other essential spices

Our flagship product, **Mama's Chilli Powder**, is a fast-moving item specifically tailored for the Nigerian consumer palate.

{/* Placeholder for a product image */}
{/* Why Choose Us Section */}

Why Choose PKVK?

Direct from India

We source our spices directly from manufacturers in India, ensuring competitive pricing and unparalleled freshness.

Local Expertise

Our founder's 15+ years of experience in Nigeria gives us real-time market insights and a deep understanding of local tastes.

Quality & Customization

We are committed to export-quality standards and can customize our spice mixes to meet specific African taste profiles.

{/* Traction Section */}

Our Milestones
